name: Zero Call
description:
Planet Nora 189XOP is one of the plutonium-producing candidate, planets being studied by 3 orbiters. but during the research the moon of planet Nora 189XOP, namely Vio 89U, was hit by an asteroid so that many debris of it headed to the orbiter.

The entire orbiter crew prepares for an emergency launch but it takes them 1 minute to prepare it. Protect the orbiter crew so they can safely make an emergency launch.
